text:
Hello Everyone, I really need help from you experts:

I want to publish an app in the HubSpot App marketplace and in my app I want to keep a condition that if someone has a HubSpot operation hub then only additional fields will be synced and two-way sync will be there.

Sharing one example: In the below account I have the HubSpot Operation Hub so it says that the app is compatible with the HubSpot plan. (Screenshot 1)

Whereas in the other account, I do not have the HubSpot Operation Hub so it says this (screenshot 2)

How can I setup this condition in my app?

Hi Everyone,
I have an app named `Livlyt-App` , I completed the domain verification process, but still my app is not showing as an verified app, can someone please help me out on this

Hi EveryOne,
How can a make custom theme for HubSpot?
please guide me
thanks for sharing - this is yuge. Hadn’t seen it announced anywhere else either. Must have been updated very recently (the documentation).
Yeah not sure where the announcement went for this

Hello everyone :wave:
How do HubSpot track feature requests exactly ?
Having worked with HubSpot CMS for the past 2 years, my biggest frustration and probably main reason why I turn away some clients from HubSpot CMS is the lack of crop functionality available in hubl.
It’s been a requested feature since 2019 and I’m quite surprised that it has been totally ignore by the development team despite the large engagement.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-crop-functionality-to-the-resize-image-url-function/idi-p/266119>
